title: [BUG] lost block data when Unwind Execution
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `2.42.0`

OS & Version: Linux

Concensus Layer: prysm

Chain/Network: mainnet

sometimes erigon will occurs problem with lost block data, log below:

```
May 06 09:59:51 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [INFO] [05-06|09:59:51.824] [2/15 Headers] Handling new payload      height=17198451 hash=0xe96234e86e53b90edc3bde8b406>
May 06 09:59:52 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [INFO] [05-06|09:59:52.000] [2/15 Headers] Waiting for Consensus Layer...
May 06 09:59:52 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [INFO] [05-06|09:59:52.017] [2/15 Headers] Fork choice update: flushing in-memory state (built by previous newPayload)
May 06 09:59:52 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [INFO] [05-06|09:59:52.279] Commit cycle                             in=36.969531ms
May 06 09:59:52 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [INFO] [05-06|09:59:52.279] Timings (slower than 50ms)               Headers=136ms
May 06 09:59:52 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [INFO] [05-06|09:59:52.279] Tables                                   PlainState=90.7GB AccountChangeSet=190.0GB Storage>

May 06 09:59:52 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [INFO] [05-06|09:59:52.313] [2/15 Headers] Waiting for Consensus Layer...
May 06 09:59:52 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [WARN] [05-06|09:59:52.471] Served                                   conn=192.168.50.159:55714 method=eth_call reqid=12>
May 06 09:59:58 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [WARN] [05-06|09:59:58.906] Served                                   conn=192.168.50.159:33998 method=eth_call reqid=20>
May 06 09:59:59 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [WARN] [05-06|09:59:59.732] Served                                   conn=192.168.50.159:44334 method=eth_call reqid=12>
May 06 09:59:59 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [WARN] [05-06|09:59:59.772] Served                                   conn=192.168.50.159:33998 method=eth_call reqid=20>
May 06 10:00:00 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [INFO] [05-06|10:00:00.887] [2/15 Headers] Handling new payload      height=17198451 hash=0x202181a0ea61bd9df1419f04cca>

May 06 10:00:00 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [INFO] [05-06|10:00:00.891] [6/7 HashState] Unwinding started        from=17198451 to=17198450 storage=false codes=false

May 06 10:00:03 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [WARN] [05-06|10:00:03.993] Served                                   conn=192.168.50.159:33998 method=eth_call reqid=20>
May 06 10:00:04 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [WARN] [05-06|10:00:04.480] Served                                   conn=192.168.50.159:33998 method=eth_call reqid=20>
May 06 10:00:05 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [WARN] [05-06|10:00:05.689] Served                                   conn=192.168.50.159:33998 method=eth_call reqid=20>
May 06 10:00:05 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [WARN] [05-06|10:00:05.821] Served                                   conn=192.168.50.159:33998 method=eth_call reqid=20>
May 06 10:00:07 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [WARN] [05-06|10:00:07.194] Served                                   conn=192.168.50.159:41336 method=eth_call reqid=12>
May 06 10:00:07 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [WARN] [05-06|10:00:07.266] Served                                   conn=192.168.50.159:33998 method=eth_call reqid=20>
May 06 10:00:12 local-ubuntu erigon-2.42.0[21710]: [INFO] [05-06|10:00:12.219] [txpool] stat                            block=17198451 pending=1499 baseFee=10195 queued=1>
```

I have a program to always read the latest transacations in block, But when this problem occurs, my program will did nothing with empty data.
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
This issue was closed because it has been stalled for 7 days with no activity.
